programme.title: Ideefix
programme.desc: Täna varastavad roomlased Lutetiast kogu leiva, et rahvas tsirkusesse meelitada. Kas Taltsutamatutel õnnestub nad peatada?(n)

programme.title: Swang
programme.desc: Esietenduse järgne pidu toimub jäätisekohvikus. Lumi kuuleb Lelle saladusest ja tüdrukute sõprus pannakse taas proovile.(n)

programme.title: Minu rüütel ja mina
programme.desc: Rüütlid kipuvad üha enam sahkerdama ja logelema ning on ühtse meeskonnana pingutamise sootuks unustanud. Nii saadetakse nad kõik tagasi kooli, et Juku, Kats ja Punane Rüütel neile meelde tuletaksid, kuidas tuleb oma riiki kaitsta.(n)

programme.title: Peeter Pikk-kõrv
The Tale of the Radish Robber
programme.desc: Beatrix Potteri kuulsatel lasteraamatutel põhinev sari jälgib nutika jänese Peeter Pikk-Kõrva ja tema sõprade Benjamini ning Lilli seiklusi metsas, kus nad satuvad vastamisi küll rebase, mägra, härra McGregori ja teiste tegelastega. 1. osas: Peeter ja sõbrad otsivad kohta, kus rahus süüa härra McGregori aiast näpatud rediseid, kuid avastavad üllatusega, et neid jälitab rediseröövel.(n)

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Marla ja Roger ajavad taimevahetuse tuhinas seemned sassi ning jäneste porgandipõllul hakkavad võrsuma hoopis ohtlikud lihasööjataimed. Džungliässad ruttavad jänestele appi, see pole aga nii lihtne, sest jänesed tähistavad parajasti pulma-aastapäeva. Lisaks kõigele muule saab Gilbert Migueli käitumisest valesti aru ja muutub armukadedaks.(n)

programme.title: Pips ja Popi
programme.desc: Popist saab kuningas Popi ja tema alamana peab Pips ta käske täitma.(n)

programme.title: Lehm Liselotte
programme.desc: Liselotte peab loomaarsti juurde minema ja postiljon leiab talle asendaja. Liselotte pole aga selle üle sugugi rõõmus….(n)

programme.title: Lepatriinu ja Musta Kassi imelised lood
programme.desc: Marinette klass sõidab homme rongiga Londonisse Big Beni vaatama, aga tema arvab, et ei tohiks kaasa minna. Meister Fu leiab siiski lahenduse.(n)

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.30 või 18.30. Meie saatejuhtidele ja reporteritele saad oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Sarja toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.(n)

programme.title: Rakett 69
programme.desc: Värsked raketlased jagunevad punasesse, sinisesse ja rohelisse tiimi ja peavad kohe üksikutest osadest kokku panema ühtse meeskonna. Esimeste ülesannetega saab selgeks, millisesse võistkonda on koondunud üksikud geeniused ja kes suudab kõige kiiremini oma vigadest õppida. Tootja Vesilind OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Pudasjärvis ollakse silmitsi raske otsusega. Aleksi tutvub Šotimaa kalapüügimeetoditega. Aki ja Emilia võtavad viimast koerarakendisõidust. Manul on köögis käed-jalad tööd täis.(n)

programme.title: Esimene leedi Eugénie Bonaparte
Eugénie, première First Lady
programme.desc: Range katoliiklane ja ühtlasi tüdrukute haridust toetav feminist, keiser Napoleon Kolmanda edumeelne ning siiski vihatud abikaasa Eugénie suri 1920. aastal kõrges eas, olles oma pea sajandipikkuse elu jooksul olnud Prantsusmaal aset leidnud sotsiaalsete, sõjaliste ja tehnoloogiliste muutuste tunnistajaks ning toetajaks. Teda võiks võrrelda pigem Jackie Kennedy ja leedi Dianaga kui ta eelkäijate ning kaasaegsetega. Poliitikatuultes riigist pagendatud keisrinna jääb surmani Prantsusmaa patrioodiks, kuigi uus riigivõim eelistaks oma ajast palju ees olnud naise ajaloost kustutada.(n)

programme.title: Kirjandusministri juures. Muusika eri
programme.desc: Laulukirjutaja Stig Rästa, kes on ise üles astunud suurel eurolaval ja aidanud sinna jõuda ka mitmel teisel artistil, jagab stuudios oma kogemusi ka kirjandusministrile. Saatejuht Mart Juur, toimetaja Tauno Vahter, režissöör Maire Radsin, produtsendid Erle Loonurm ja Janno-Hans Arro.(n)

programme.title: Vaala maitse
A taste of Whale
programme.desc: Fjordis haljendavate mägede vahel värvub vesi veripunaseks. Algab „grind“, Fääri saarte rituaalne vaalatapp. Uhked kohalikud vaalakütid on ühel pool, loomakaitsjad teisel ja nende konflikt on paratamatu. Aga kaalul on palju enamat. Dokumentaalfilm võtab luubi alla mitmed eelarvamused ja uurib vaalaliha söömise sügavamat sisu.(n)

programme.title: Motherless Brooklyn
programme.desc: Set in the 1950s, a private detective with Tourette's syndrome, Lionel Essrog, loses his only friend and mentor Frank Minna. Lionel then ventures into the slums of Brooklyn and Harlem to uncover the truth about his friend's death.

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: When a couple hires a young nanny to care for their 8-year-old son, she is shocked to discover that her charge is, in fact, a life-sized doll whose care involves a strict list of rules. After ignoring the rules for her own routine, inexplicable events convince her that the doll is actually alive.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: An A cappella group enter into an international competition that no American team has ever won before.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sports agent Jerry Maguire is fired after he exposes the dishonesty and corruption that rules his career field. As he loses everything, he tries to prove the success of his new management philosophy with the help of his secretary and the one client who agreed not to fire him.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: In search of a better life, a Korean American moves to Arkansas where they attempt to find their slice of the American dream on a small farm. But they do not account for the changes that will take over their lives when the grandmother arrives at their new farm.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: After R (a highly unusual zombie) saves Julie from a zombie attack, the two form an unusual bond that sets in motion a sequence of events that could transform the entire lifeless world.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A horror comedy about two guys who have succeeded in remaining alive in the midst of a zombie outbreak. Their secret to survival: an alliance with sorcerers and a little bit of explosive firepower.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahasse, Wichita, and Little Rock move to the heart of America where they face surviving zombies, as well as the growing pains of the cynical substitute family.

programme.title: This Is the End
programme.desc: James Franco invited many of his friends to attend his housewarming party in LA including Jonah Hill, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel, Craig Robinson, Michael Cera and others. Suddenly, during the party, the Biblical Apocalypse begins. They hide inside the house and try to survive the end of the world.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: In order to avoid unwanted comparisons with their own track records, the supervisors of skilled London officer Nicholas Angel banish him to the quiet small town of Sandford. But the small town soon becomes the location of some suspicious incidents that Angel is determined to get to the bottom of.

programme.title: City Slickers
programme.desc: A man facing a midlife crisis joins his two friends as they go on a cattle drive across the Southwest. Their journey reveals to them more about themselves and helps them conquer their fear of aging.

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: Paul and Audrey Safranek are a married couple who live in Omaha. Paul (played by Matt Damon) is a good-natured occupational therapist whose wife dreams of having a bigger house. Upon meeting their friends Dave and Carol Johnson who have downsized into 5 inches height, they learned that downsizing would increase the value of their assets by a 100 folds and will also reduce human waste and thus save the planet. After agreeing to downsize, Audrey backs out in the last moment and Paul realises that his problems will be getting bigger as he got smaller.

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Sam and Molly's romance comes to a brutal end when Sam gets killed on the street by a thug. Left behind in spirit form, Sam enlists the help of a psychic to protect Molly from his former partner and the danger he poses to her.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Tuck and Frank (Tom Hardy and Chris Pine) are two best friends and CIA agents. They fall in love with the same girl, Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). She's confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her.

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: A remake of the 1988 “Dirty little scoundrels”, starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson as two scam artist trying their best shot at conning a filthy rich Tech wonder.

programme.title: A Simple Favor
programme.desc: Stephanie, a mother who works as a blogger, seeks to discover the mystery of the disappearance of her friend Emily from the city by joining her friend's husband, where everyone is subjected to love and loyalty tests and secrets that could cause murder and revenge.

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: Audrey and Morgan, are two best friends in their thirties who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when Audery's ex-boyfriend suddenly shows up at their apartment with a team of deadly assassins on his trail.

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: When she starts a relationship with a seemingly perfect man, the last thing Martha expects is for him to turn out to be an assassin. When the past comes back to haunt her new beau, Martha must make a choice as she is thrust into a manic world.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Tuck and Frank (Tom Hardy and Chris Pine) are two best friends and CIA agents. They fall in love with the same girl, Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). She's confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her.

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: A remake of the 1988 “Dirty little scoundrels”, starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson as two scam artist trying their best shot at conning a filthy rich Tech wonder.(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: The true story of how down-on-her-luck single mother Erin Brokovish put together one of the biggest class actions suits in US history and won the high profile case against a multi-million dollar company despite her lack of formal education in the law.(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sports agent Jerry Maguire is fired after he exposes the dishonesty and corruption that rules his career field. As he loses everything, he tries to prove the success of his new management philosophy with the help of his secretary and the one client who agreed not to fire him.(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Middle-aged and unemployed (Brennan) and (Dale),are staying in their parents homes. Until the father of one of them decides to marry the other's mother, so they find themselves forced to live together in one house. They have to work together to find a job.(n)

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: A small Wisconsin town becomes the center of political attention, when a Democrat strategist named Gary tries to help a retired Marine Colonel run for mayor.(n)

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: Diana moves to Miami and starts shopping and buying a lot of things at an abnormal rate with the stolen credit card of businessman named Sandy Patterson. He decides to follow Diana to Miami and confront her before she takes over everything he has, but he discovers that it's not that easy.(n)

programme.title: Stuber
programme.desc: Stu is a mild-mannered Uber driver , who picks up Vic, a hotheaded cop who had recently undergone a laser eye surgery, and is on a trail of a brutal killer. His ride becomes an ordeal where he must hold on to his life, quick wits and his five-star rating.(n)

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A small loving family is forced to live in silence while hiding from creatures that hunt by sound.(n)

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: Jim Bennett is a literature professor who's suffering from a gambling addiction, which gets him in muddy waters with a group of gangsters.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: Frank Abagnale Jr. leaves his family's home at sixteen years old, and relies upon his cheque-forging abilities to make money, making up to two and a half million dollars. During that time, FBI agent Carl Hanratty, is after Frank, who seems to be always one step ahead.

programme.title: Eighth Grade
programme.desc: As her days in middle school come to an end, the introverted Kayla uses Youtube as a way to communicate with the outside world, crafting a self-confident persona that doesn't match her shy interactions with the outside world.

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: A fateful encounter with a stranger puts the stable, albeit tepid, marriage of Connie and Edward on the line as Connie starts an affair with the stranger, Paul. As Edward suspects that his wife is cheating on him, he comes to realize that there is a dark side to his anger.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: When Marty McFly accidentally travels back in time in Dr. Emmett Brown's time machine, his presence in the past causes unforeseen consequences. He must find a way to bring the teenage version of his parents together if he doesn't want to be erased from existence.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Marty accompanies Dr. Emmett Brown to the future in a mission to save his future son from prison. But when his actions in the future drastically change the present, they must set things right.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: When Dr. Emmett gets trapped in 1885, Marty uses the DeLorean to travel back to 1885 to the old west where he races against time to get his friend out before he is killed.

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: When the body of crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found, Detective Benoit Blanc takes charge of the crime investigation and finds himself involved in numerous events in search of the truth.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimsby
programme.desc: Nobby has a large family of nine and a loving wife, but despite this beautiful life, he misses his brother, Sebastian, an MI6 agent. Nobby tries to find his brother after years of separation when they were adopted by many families. Then the brothers are exposed to many obstacles and difficulties.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: Frank Abagnale Jr. leaves his family's home at sixteen years old, and relies upon his cheque-forging abilities to make money, making up to two and a half million dollars. During that time, FBI agent Carl Hanratty, is after Frank, who seems to be always one step ahead.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: When Marty McFly accidentally travels back in time in Dr. Emmett Brown's time machine, his presence in the past causes unforeseen consequences. He must find a way to bring the teenage version of his parents together if he doesn't want to be erased from existence.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: The talented Rod Campbell prepares for the greatest stunt of his life, jumping over 15 buses with his bike, in order to make enough money for his stepfather's heart operation.

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: When the body of crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found, Detective Benoit Blanc takes charge of the crime investigation and finds himself involved in numerous events in search of the truth.

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: In the wake of his brother's suicide, Tyler's family splinters off under the pressure of their trauma. When he meets Ally, they find solace for their individual familial troubles in each other's arms. Love is born amid tragedy as both Ally and Tyler change each other's lives.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Special forces soldier John falls in love with Savannah at first sight, while on vacation in his hometown. They both know that John will be back in the military in the future, and the September 11th attacks cause him to go back soon. Things then get complicated between them and their relationship almost reaches breaking point. Is their love strong enough to survive.

programme.title: The Fault in Our Stars
programme.desc: Hazel and Gus are two teenagers who share an acerbic wit, a disdain for the conventional, and a love that sweeps them on a journey. Their relationship is all the more miraculous given that Hazel's other constant companion is an oxygen tank, Gus jokes about his prosthetic leg, and they met and fell in love at a cancer support group.

programme.title: That Awkward Moment
programme.desc: Three best friends find themselves in that awkward moment in dating relationships when one asks himself : Where will this end up? Is this official or just a fling? Will we live happily ever after or is it time to call it quits.

programme.title: Jexi
programme.desc: A comedy about Phil who finds himself loved by the artificial intelligence programmed in his Jixi cell phone, and his social life becomes completely ruined.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Dan hooks up with a female editor and maintains a short-lived relationship with her, but that relationship turns into hell when she threatens to reveal their relationship to his wife and friends. Dan tries to deal with her threats and inappropriate behavior in diverse ways.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: When Marty McFly accidentally travels back in time in Dr. Emmett Brown's time machine, his presence in the past causes unforeseen consequences. He must find a way to bring the teenage version of his parents together if he doesn't want to be erased from existence.(n)

programme.title: Septembers of Shiraz
programme.desc: The once all-embracing Iranian society turns into a less accepting hell, with a revolution on the horizon threatening to send a Jewish family away from the prosperous existence they have carved out in Iran.(n)

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: Following the Battle of Gallipoli in 1919, an Australian farmer decides to head to Turkey in order to locate his three missing sons there, after he promised his wife to give them a proper burial.(n)

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: April, 1945. As the Allies make their final push in the European Theatre, a battle-hardened army sergeant named Wardaddy (Brad Pitt) commands a Sherman tank and her five-man crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Outnumbered and outgunned, Wardaddy and his men face overwhelming odds in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Evacuation of Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire, Canada, and France, who were cut off and surrounded by the German army from the beaches and harbor of Dunkirk, France, between May 27- June 04, 1940, during Battle of France in World War II.(n)

During World War I, two British soldiers go on an impossible mission, where they must enter the enemy territory, to deliver a message to prevent their beleaguered troops from marching towards a deadly trap.(n)

programme.desc: On Christmas in 1954, Wealthy philanthropist Rachel Argyll is killed in her family's home, Sunny Point. Her adopted son, Jack is arrested for killing her, but he strongly protests trying to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Faded professional wrestler Randy 'The Ram' Robinson struggles to adjust to life outside the wrestling ring, as he juggles with keeping a small time job, mending his relationship with his estranged daughter and bonding with a stripper.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask
programme.desc: As the anger against King Louis XIV reaches boiling point, the three Musketeers unite with D'Artagnan to replace the hated king with his secret twin brother who has been imprisoned and put in an iron mask to hide his true identity.

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: The true story of boxer James Braddock, who was a boxing champion in the 1930s until he began to suffer injuries and broke his left hand and became poor in a period where only the rich survive, how will he support himself, wife and three children with a broken hand in the winter.

programme.title: Men in Black: International
programme.desc: On every mission, the Men in Black have always protected the Earth from the scum of the universe but on this new adventure, they tackle their biggest threat to date: an infiltrator in their organization.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with a luxurious voyage on a cruise to give him the chance to enjoy his time instead of always provide the fun for everyone else. On the cruise he falls for the mysterious ship captain, Ericka.(n)

programme.desc: On Christmas in 1954, Wealthy philanthropist Rachel Argyll is killed in her family's home, Sunny Point. Her adopted son, Jack is arrested for killing her, but he strongly protests trying to prove his innocence.(n)

programme.title: Still Alice
programme.desc: Alice is a renowned linguist who is happily married and has three children. As she starts to forget words, it gradually unfolds that she has Alzheimer's, and her relationship with her family is put to test.(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In a dystopian post-apocalyptic future in the nation of Panem, Katniss Everdeen (Lawrence) volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, where boys and girls between the ages of 12 and 18 are required to fight to death in a televised annual event until there is one remaining who will be crowned the victor.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: A victim of domestic abuse,Anna Poliatova, accepts an offer to become an undercover KGB assassin while working as a model. She shows indelible strength and fearsome determination to reach one goal: her freedom. But first, Anna must survive the conflicting agendas of the KGB and the CIA.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: Based on his own book, this is the true story of Jordan Belfort. A stock-broker who had it all after his rise to the high life of a millionaire and lost it all after his fall involving crime and the federal government.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
programme.desc: Katniss finds herself in District 13 after she literally shatters the game forever, faced with a decision that could sway the fate of her nation. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss reluctantly becomes the symbol of mass revolution against the autocratic Capitol.

programme.title: Murderous Trance
programme.desc: While investigating a mysterious crime that he suspects involved hypnosis, criminal investigator Anders Olsen teams up with a psychiatrist in order to know more about the power the true culprit, Björn Schow Nielsen, may possess. But little does he know that the case is about to turn personal for him.

programme.title: Legacy of Lies
programme.desc: After retiring from his work in MI6, former agent Martin Baxter is thrust back into his old dangerous life, as he joins forces with a Ukrainian journalist to uncover a conspiracy that is connected to Russian covert operations.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Twenty years after the alien invasion that threatened the destruction of mankind, the alien mothership comes to Earth and the armies of the world have to work together to protect the planet from annihilation.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: A victim of domestic abuse,Anna Poliatova, accepts an offer to become an undercover KGB assassin while working as a model. She shows indelible strength and fearsome determination to reach one goal: her freedom. But first, Anna must survive the conflicting agendas of the KGB and the CIA.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: Based on his own book, this is the true story of Jordan Belfort. A stock-broker who had it all after his rise to the high life of a millionaire and lost it all after his fall involving crime and the federal government.

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Once a school athlete, Chris tries to turn over a new leaf as he gets a job as a janitor at a bank. As he attempts to turn his life around and enjoy a normal existence, things go awry when he finds himself accused of planning a grand heist.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: In the wake of a plane crash, a man gets stranded in the Arctic. Faced with a frozen wasteland and dangerous prospectives, he has to make the difficult choice between remaining in his current camp or venturing out into the frozen wilderness looking for rescue.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: In a mythical world, the personal revenge of the barbarian warrior Conan turns into an epic battle against all of his adversaries and enormous monsters, at the heart of impossible odds, becoming the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria from the domination of supernatural evil forces.(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: The repressed Panem is on the verge of rebellion as 74th Hunger Game victors Katniss and Peeta visit the districts on their victory tour. The two have become symbols of defiance against the Capitol, and for that they will be targeted by the despotic President Snow and his regime.(n)

programme.title: Acceleration
programme.desc: After an ill-fated decision to deceive her gangster boss, Rhona is blackmailed into carrying out his hits and getting him the information he needs, all while he uses her son's life as leverage to force her to do his bidding.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: In Ancient Greece 1200 B.C., a queen succumbs to the lust of Zeus to bear a son promised to overthrow the tyrannical rule of the king and restore peace to a land in hardship. But this prince, Hercules, knows nothing of his real identity or his destiny. He desires only one thing: the love of Hebe, Princess of Crete, who has been promised to his own brother. When Hercules learns of his greater purpose, he must choose: to flee with his true love or to fulfill his destiny and become the true hero of his time. The story behind one of the greatest myths is revealed in this action-packed epic - a tale of love, sacrifice and the strength of the human spirit.(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: When a spacecraft lands in New York City with a human-like alien named Klaatu on board, the army considers him a threat, but scientist Helen Benson finds out that he's here to save mankind.(n)

programme.title: Humor Me
programme.desc: (Nate) a playwright struggling to finish his new play, is unable to pay the rent, after his wife leaves him. So he went to live with his funny widowed father. His father made him work, where he discovers a senior citizen theater group and decides to help them.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: When Robin Cavendish is struck down by polio at the age of 28, he is confined to the hospital as most of his body parts are paralyzed and he is given only a few months to live. However, as he defeats his disability and recovers, he devotes his life to help other polio patients.

programme.title: After
programme.desc: Tessa Young is a good young woman dedicated to her college education. She is encouraged by her college friends to attend a night party where she meets a notorious boy, Hardin Scott, and despite their warnings to stay away from him, he succeeds at making her heart fall in love with him. Her simple life then witnessed the beginning of an "after" part to it.

programme.title: Run The Race
programme.desc: Zach's plans for a better future are derailed when a serious knee injury forces him off the football field. As his brother steps in to try and fill the void, the bonds of brotherhood are put to the test.
